title: Gamers On-Chained
description: What Blockchain gaming applications should be developed to achieve mass adoption of Cardano?

f6_assessments.q0: This challenge proposal has a high impact potential in onboarding a possible 2.5 billion people on the Cardano blockchain. Adoption is crucial for a blockchain that aims to create a global operating system. Integrating the gamer community would certainly help to achieve this and would also generate publicity.
f6_assessments.q1:
The Catalyst community and by extension the crypto community and the gamer community are intertwined since both are technical in nature. 
It would be nice to see which solutions could arise.
f6_assessments.q2:
Key metrics are well defined. 
The requested 250k USD to fund the challenge is realistic.

f6_assessments.q0: Cardano's mission to be the global operating system will require outreach into every facet of modern life and the claimed 2.5billion gamers will most certainly need to interact in some capacity with such a system. There could arguably be no better marriage of technologies than the crypto and the gaming industries. I myself am not a gamer but can appreciate the synergies between the two and the criticality of bringing along the gaming community into Cardano's journey. This challenge may well prove to be one of the more successful funding platforms for new applications yet to reach the market.
f6_assessments.q1: Past Catalyst funding rounds are a good gauge of this challenge's feasibility given the success of proposals which could have been submitted under this challenge had it been present at the time. One example would be PlayerMint from Funds 4 & 5. One could argue that this challenge is not only feasible but could lead to a more finessed DApp & Integration challenge, given this can now provide a home for the niche gaming proposals. The overlap may well occur with the NFT Business Models but proper education and mentoring of proposals could minimise chances of submitting one under the wrong proposal. Nonetheless, that is a good problem to have for Catalyst. Looking forward to the results of the vote as I believe this would be a popular choice with the Cardano community & its already thriving NFT market.
f6_assessments.q2: The gaming industry is well and truly established hence the presented 12 key metrics can be easily tracked and quantified from within Catalyst. As this segment matures in the coming months and years, the community may well add to these KPIs with the advent of more novel ways gaming and blockchain can interact, which may not have even been thought of as yet. The NFT space alone could spawn the kinds of interactions that could lead to greater successes, a more global appeal and a more widespread adoption for Cardano and the gaming industry.

f6_assessments.q0:
Gamers On-Chained

I agree with this proposal because  I am a gamer, I love gaming, I have been gaming for over 40 years from the age of 8.  I also recognize the huge value that gaming on blockchain would have for game creators as well as gamers.
f6_assessments.q1: The budget for this project is reasonable .
f6_assessments.q2:
The Verifiability of this is clear. Metrics have been identified, a roadmap has been laid out to be carried out.
Metrics include 
Total users of gaming based applications built on Cardano
Number of gaming based applications building/built on Cardano
Amount of value made by gamers in play-to-earn applications
Number of CNFTs made specifically for gaming
Number of fungible tokens made specifically for gaming
Number of gaming based content creators that have come to Cardano

- Number of gaming tournaments hosted for Cardano native assets

- Number of proposals submitted to this challenge

- Amount of comments and kudos given to submitted proposals

- Amount of ADA voted on proposals in this challenge

- Amount of Wallets voted on proposals in this challenge

- Amount and evolution of gaming based tokens and wallets

Gaming on blockchain is a very new area. As such getting into it fast is of prime importance. To gain dominance and first mover advantages.

f6_assessments.q0: A perfect challenge setting to be implemented into Catalyst. It has huge potential since there are over 3billion gamers all over the world. Adding the gaming community by allowing game developers to have funding with Project Catalyst would considerably strengthen our position to become a global ecosystem.
f6_assessments.q1: I believe this challenge setting is highly feasible. since I believe in the crypto community there is already a percentage that is in the gaming community. Since these two communities are already connected through Catalyst it would be great to see what proposals this challenge would bring us. I would even consider bumping up the budget for this proposal.
f6_assessments.q2: The metrics that are provided are clearly in line with the challenge settings and practical. Criteria for success is an enormous one but as we know gamers are usually the ones that go big or go home.

f6_assessments.q0: Cardano's mission is to improve the systems of the world. Improving the gaming industry for the 2.5B end-users around the world its for sure aligned with that.
f6_assessments.q1: Does the Catalyst community have the capacity to address the challenge? For sure! With the release of smart contracts in Sep 12, it will be possible to create plenty of solutions to bring mass adoption to the protocol.
f6_assessments.q2: The success criteria and the suggested metrics to measure progress are well defined and strategically relevant.

importance: Gamers are ready to enter crypto. They just need a clear blockchain with enjoyable applications to engage on.
success: Cardano becomes the go to blockchain to develop gaming applications due to its quality tooling and wide gamer centric user base.
